org.trianacode.gui.appmaker

Class CommandLineWizard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.appmaker.CommandLineWizard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WizardListener

    public class CommandLineWizard
extends java.lang.Object
implements WizardListener
    A class for displaying the command line application wizard, and generating a command line application class.
